title: ALife Definitions Benchmark: Data and Code
description: Empirical benchmark comparing four operational definitions of life (textbook 7-criteria, Darwinian/NASA, autonomy/organizational closure, information maintenance) on the same digital organisms across five environment regimes. Includes simulation code, definition adapters, raw benchmark data, score matrices, and analysis scripts.
notes: Anonymized for double-blind review. Creator names and affiliations will be added post-acceptance.
